job_description: Build, maintain and design user-friendly interfaces for healthcare applications, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience for medical staff, administrators, and patients.

Developed Risk Integration Management System dashboard where users could view their risk management. Integrated React.js with framework Next.js to display data and interactive charts, providing users with a clear overview of their activities.
Developed and styled interactive web apps employer for job seekers to find jobs and employers to post job openings. Collaborated with UI team and engineers to create new brands and design systems.

Developed, style and ship high-quality healthcare web apps for desktop and mobile view include secure user authorization, profile creation, appointment scheduling, search, filters, reviews patient and ratings.
